name: kaiseki
description: A Parse.com REST API Client for Node.js

scripts.//: using || to closeParse and then mark as failed to avoid trigger cleanup again
scripts.test: echo 'wait few sec to start local parse'; sleep 2s; ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --reporter spec --timeout 30000 || ( npm run cleanup; exit 1 )
scripts.cleanup: ./node_modules/.bin/mongodb-runner stop; echo 'close parse'; npm run closeParse
